name: Infinity Soul
description:
Submission for Epic MEGA Jam 2020

They were captured by the system about to be destroyed.  You were with them all along but now you will be to protect their soul, as long as it takes.

Survive waves of enemies with limited health, health regenerates after a round is complete.

WASD and Mouse to move

Shift- Dash Only 2 and each recharge in 1 second

Space-  jump/double jump

1/2- Switch weapons
